scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

releases.name: v2.11.1
releases.body: ### 2.11.1 (2017-02-13) #### Bug Fixes * **DataGenerator:** Fix number of components ([f88177e1](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f88177e1))

releases.name: v2.10.11
releases.body: ### 2.10.11 (2017-02-10) #### Bug Fixes * **OBJReader:** * More fix for point handling ([4d6b2234](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/4d6b2234)) * Add normals to output ([3b630b83](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/3b630b83))

releases.name: v2.10.10
releases.body: ### 2.10.10 (2017-02-10) #### Bug Fixes * **OBJReader:** * Duplicate point when tc does not match previous tc for point ([0816aba4](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0816aba4)) * Better texture coordinate handling ([54ce91e7](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/54ce91e7)) * **OBJRepresentation:** Handle actor property ([2f182acf](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/2f182acf)) * **Rendering:** support resampling textures to power of 2 ([dc1cb331](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/dc1cb331)) * **Texture:** * Ensure Y flip of texture ([82f4942f](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/82f4942f)) * ensure strecth of image to keep tcoords correct ([1f0aaba2](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/1f0aaba2))

releases.name: v2.10.9
releases.body: ### 2.10.9 (2017-02-10) #### Bug Fixes * **CellArrayBufferObject:** Use DynamicFloat32Array ([f9a2ec24](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f9a2ec24)) * **DynamicFloat32Array:** * Better code ([eccff6f5](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/eccff6f5)) * Try to provide replacement for complex DynamicTypedArray ([1e432927](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/1e432927)) * **DynamicTypedArray:** Removed ([ee5b006a](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ee5b006a)) * **SphereMapper:** Use DynamicFloat32Array ([43050d04](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/43050d04)) * **StickMapper:** Use DynamicFloat32Array ([a546a502](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a546a502))

releases.body: ### 2.10.8 (2017-02-10) #### Bug Fixes * **Example:** Create OBJ example with texture map ([07a8ef57](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/07a8ef57)) * **MTLReader:** add MTL reader of OBJ ([e26e3ffb](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e26e3ffb)) * **OBJReader:** Improve reader to allow various way of split ([83a96178](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/83a96178)) * **Representation:** Add representation infrastructure ([fe5fbf85](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/fe5fbf85))

releases.name: v2.4.0
releases.body: ## 2.4.0 (2016-12-23) #### Bug Fixes - **Sources:** Update existing sources and filters to remove MTime check ([0372d1b5](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0372d1b5)) - **testAlgorithm:** Override shouldUpdate to prevent the need of getMTime() ([42698c74](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/42698c74)) #### Features - **algo:** Update pipeline execution model to prevent useless requestData execution ([c86bd65e](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c86bd65e))

releases.name: v2.3.1
releases.body: ### 2.3.1 (2016-12-21) #### Bug Fixes - **ClassFactory:** Fix class creation issue ([14c33ffa](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/14c33ffa)) - **defaultValue:** Make sure initial values do not get replaced by defaults ([a6bf6404](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a6bf6404))

releases.name: v2.3.0
releases.body: ## 2.3.0 (2016-12-21) #### Bug Fixes - **API:** Fix usage of vtkPoints across classes ([ee67b686](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ee67b686)) - **CellArray:** Use vtkCellArray instead of plain vtkDataArray ([fb991ac7](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/fb991ac7)) - **Data:** - Update data to use vtkCellArray instead of plain vtkDataArray ([0bd69a67](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0bd69a67)) - Fix data structure for vtkPoints ([01fdaf36](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/01fdaf36)) - **DataGenerator:** Fix python to generate the proper data structure with vtkPoints and vtkCellArray ([783b5355](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/783b5355)) - **HttpDataSetReader:** Update code to load vtkPoints ref instead of vtkPoints.data ref ([904d25d1](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/904d25d1)) - **Points:** - Fix getBounds method to use itself instead of data ([96d2a343](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/96d2a343)) - Make vtkPoints inherit from vtkDataArray instead of composed ([b7846e49](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/b7846e49)) - **testSerialization.js:** Adapt polydata structure ([7c73992d](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/7c73992d)) #### Features - **CellArray:** Add CellArray class that inherit from vtkDataArray ([b7c656af](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/b7c656af))

releases.name: v2.2.0
releases.body: ## 2.2.0 (2016-12-20) #### Bug Fixes - **InteractorStyles:** Do not use both extend and obj on macro'd things ([5817c856](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/5817c856)) #### Features - **InteractorStyleManipulator:** Add manipulator-based interactor style ([a17ed05c](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a17ed05c))

releases.name: v2.1.2
releases.body: ### 2.1.2 (2016-12-13) #### Bug Fixes - **vtk:** Fix generated library to be usable as external script ([f931c1c9](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f931c1c9))

releases.name: v2.1.1
releases.body: ### 2.1.1 (2016-12-13) #### Bug Fixes - **FullScreenRenderWindow:** Update RenderWindowInteractor API usage ([9b4f0967](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/9b4f0967)) - **RenderWindowInteractor:** Try to prevent ctrl+click on Mac to trigger context menu while enabling ([d64efe50](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/d64efe50))

releases.name: v2.1.0
releases.body: ## 2.1.0 (2016-12-12) #### Bug Fixes - **Calculator:** setFormulaSimple now works. ([f521497e](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f521497e)) - **CalculatorExample:** Improve example to by using FullScreenWindow and multi-formula ([b9789115](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/b9789115)) - **Constants:** Rename constants to follow same pattern ([ba189d56](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ba189d56)) - **FullScreenRenderWindow:** Move vtkFullScreenRenderWindow into Rendering/Misc ([ecfb8887](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ecfb8887)) - **ScalarsToColors:** Update constants to hold ScalarMappingTarget ([591d4a8e](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/591d4a8e)) - **WarpScalar:** Use first component of array... ([c189df29](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c189df29)) #### Features - **Calculator:** Multi-component input/output arrays. ([16ca24ac](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/16ca24ac)) - **ExampleRunner:** Add Example Runner to ease the development/debugging of examples ([0487329a](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0487329a))

releases.name: v2.0.1
releases.body: ### 2.0.1 (2016-12-10) #### Bug Fixes - **ConeExample:** Remove unused import and set background to black ([174e2780](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/174e2780)) - **ConeSourceExample:** Update code to use full screen render window and simplify code ([c3389260](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c3389260)) - **DataArray:** Add setTuple(idx, []) function ([0a616f5c](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0a616f5c)) - **LineSourceExample:** Code cleanup and better UI looking ([21946acf](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/21946acf)) - **PlaneSourceExample:** Code cleanup ([1235b983](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/1235b983)) - **PointSourceExample:** Code cleanup ([c4f72f55](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c4f72f55)) - **SphereSource:** Cleanup example ([c1d2559a](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c1d2559a)) - **Texture:** Update example with the FullScreenWindow class helper ([2afe0d9e](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/2afe0d9e)) - **WarpScalarExample:** Simplify example code ([a1763ba2](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a1763ba2)) - **macro:** remove mtime from generated state ([e4fec90b](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e4fec90b))

releases.name: v2.0.0
releases.body: ## 2.0.0 (2016-12-09) #### Bug Fixes - **ActorExample:** Update example using serialized actor ([72a026f4](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/72a026f4)) - **Calculator:** - Remove debug output. ([f442301f](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f442301f)) - Fix a failing test. ([ae321785](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ae321785)) - **DataArray:** - Improve tuple method again ([0670e744](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0670e744)) - Improve getTuple implementation ([dbdb0f46](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/dbdb0f46)) - **FieldData:** - Fix serialization handling in FieldData ([86d8bac6](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/86d8bac6)) - Fix getArray "overload". ([025b091f](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/025b091f)) - **HttpDataSetReader:** Fix code to handle new serialization path ([f70ea309](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f70ea309)) - **HttpSceneLoader:** Remove debug output ([e43e32a8](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e43e32a8)) - **Mapper:** - Heed the scalarVisibility flag. ([e2588f2b](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e2588f2b)) - Add arrayAccessMode ([426adba8](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/426adba8)) - **PolyDataMapper:** Make sure pointSize get used when rendering in Surface representation ([65411625](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/65411625)) - **Rendering:** - shader code and CABO not rebuilt ([79be7bc4](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/79be7bc4)) - some categorical color fixes ([a108e8bc](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a108e8bc)) - **SceneLoader:** Start working on the new Scene format ([e0844363](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e0844363)) - **WarpScalar:** Fix example filter to properly use shallowCopy ([0812aca8](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0812aca8)) - **createShallowCopy:** Remove method across various classes ([ecbb1f2d](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ecbb1f2d)) - **export-scene-macro:** - Capture Edge Visibility in the export ([d7b3b953](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/d7b3b953)) - Rename tuple to numberOfComponents ([6bcf24b8](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/6bcf24b8)) - **getOutput:** Rename getOutputData() to getOutput() ([aae93505](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/aae93505)) - **index:** add missing index entries ([c46f1925](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c46f1925)) - **macro:** add algo testing. ([4f6ea942](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/4f6ea942)) - **vtk:** - Update vtk function to always use a new mtime for any object it build ([a38c575b](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a38c575b)) - Fix vtk() factory function to handle null inside sub-array ([8aa0500e](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/8aa0500e)) - **vtkObject:** Make sure a new vtkObject instance always get a new mtime instead of using the c ([890901fc](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/890901fc)) #### Features - **Calculator:** Add example. ([6ce27af1](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/6ce27af1)) - **General:** Many internal data structure have changed ([dc17dc43](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/dc17dc43)) - **PointSource:** Added filter to generate random points ([dbacc15a](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/dbacc15a)) - **RandomSeed:** Update vtkMath to add random seed support ([b0f06d06](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/b0f06d06)) - **Rendering:** add some support for index/categorical colors ([3cb1e7f4](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/3cb1e7f4)) - **StringArray:** Add vtkStringArray implementation ([c355d8b5](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c355d8b5)) - **VariantArray:** Add vtkVariantArray ([7a7acf14](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/7a7acf14)) #### Breaking Changes - Incompatible data model change have been made ([dc17dc43](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/dc17dc43))

releases.name: v1.3.0
releases.body: ## 1.3.0 (2016-12-01) #### Features - **Rendering:** Support more LookupTable operations ([53ddecbd](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/53ddecbd), closes [#14](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/issues/14))

releases.name: v1.2.2

releases.name: v1.2.1
releases.body: ### 1.2.1 (2016-11-07) #### Bug Fixes - **On Windows FileSystem a file should be closed before removed else system throw an error.:** Add c ([f79c71a4](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f79c71a4))

releases.name: v1.2.0
releases.body: ## 1.2.0 (2016-10-25) #### Bug Fixes - **Loader:** Update loaders so baseline images get base64 encoded up to 1MB ([5f74ae51](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/5f74ae51)) #### Features - **Rendering:** Add EdgeVisibility and Coincident support ([bd498702](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/bd498702))

releases.name: v1.1.1
releases.body: ### 1.1.1 (2016-10-19) #### Bug Fixes - **InteractorStyle:** Add key handler 'v' for showing vertices (as points) ([8afe30bf](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/8afe30bf)) - **StandaloneSceneLoader:** Make sure export script captures point size ([92de1f5d](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/92de1f5d))

releases.name: v1.1.0
releases.body: ## 1.1.0 (2016-10-18) #### Features - **$compile:** fix window resize support ([1eff33bb](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/1eff33bb))

releases.name: v1.0.4
releases.body: ### 1.0.4 (2016-10-14) #### Bug Fixes - **StandaloneSceneLoader:** - Make export script work with older version of ParaView ([0173b70a](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0173b70a)) - Fix broken setSize call ([3ffee64a](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/3ffee64a))

releases.name: v1.0.3
releases.body: ### 1.0.3 (2016-10-14) #### Bug Fixes - **DataAccessHelper:** - Zip handler support nested directory ([946ae968](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/946ae968)) - Refactor exposed API and fix usage ([718addea](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/718addea)) - **Examples:** Update kw-doc to bundle example into single html file ([85c8f5b8](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/85c8f5b8)) - **StandaloneSceneLoader:** - Add export macro, sample data set, and update doc ([aa267f40](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/aa267f40)) - Allow to download a zip file for local rendering ([26738869](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/26738869)) - Fix standalone file loader ([b1ae5272](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/b1ae5272))

releases.name: v1.0.2
releases.body: ### 1.0.2 (2016-10-13) #### Bug Fixes - **DataAccessHelper:** - fix implementation for ZIP file ([b8a9836f](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/b8a9836f)) - Add implementation for ZIP file ([f02cc9ca](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f02cc9ca)) - Abstract data access to enable other option than http ([1f2e736d](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/1f2e736d)) - **HttpDataSetReader:** Fix polydata array used for geometry ([6635fbc9](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/6635fbc9)) - **HttpSceneLoader:** - Share dataAccessHelper with DataSetLoader ([7eca45a5](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/7eca45a5)) - Allow json scene descriptor to set fetchGzip flag ([0169de38](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0169de38)) - Register HttpSceneLoader and fix ESLint issue ([d2509276](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/d2509276)) - Keep track of original camera params, provide api to reset ([0b0b7241](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/0b0b7241)) - **InteractorStyleTrackballCamera:** Ease zooming interaction for OSX users ([f2b2754e](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f2b2754e)) - **OpenGL:** Register all missing classes ([c0051ce7](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c0051ce7)) - **PolyDataMapper:** Fix typo in method name ([ea96ccd5](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/ea96ccd5))

releases.name: v1.0.1
releases.body: ### 1.0.1 (2016-10-13) #### Bug Fixes - **Mapper:** Take the early return path when scalars is undefined too ([61229022](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/61229022)) - **PolyDataMapper:** Call method on publicAPI, not on model ([e892f4fa](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e892f4fa)) - **ScalarsToColors:** Fix bugs encountered when colorMode is set to "direct scalars" ([2f9ed3b0](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/2f9ed3b0))

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body: ## 1.0.0 (2016-10-12) #### Bug Fixes - **DynamicTypedArray:** Fix various import issue for DynamicTypedArray ([f66e4009](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f66e4009)) - **ESLint:** - Update lint rules while fixing code base ([a451b5a1](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a451b5a1)) - Fix OpenGL/RenderWindow arrow function ([e63ff5c7](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/e63ff5c7)) - Bump version to use the latest lint rules ([a90a2205](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/a90a2205)) - **Testing:** Add testing and coverage ([3fefe931](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/3fefe931)) - **Travis:** disable webgl tests on travis ([f1fe94c3](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/f1fe94c3)) - **WarpScalar:** Fix WarpScalar with associated ShallowCopy logic ([c3d21ede](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/c3d21ede)) - **kw-web-suite:** Update Web Suite to fix peer dependency issue with eslint ([6e968a4b](https://github.com/kitware/vtk-js/commit/6e968a4b))
